rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
代谢组学研究发现预测新生儿自闭症的生物标志物《通讯生物学》的一项研究利用新生儿的代谢组学来识别可能预测自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的标记物，发现自闭症儿童与正常发育儿童相比具有不同的代谢特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Metabolomics-study-finds-biomarkers-predicting-autism-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Metabolomics-study-finds-biomarkers-predicting-autism-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb46ed8-c980-4d1e-aa5e-c5652a4f04df Tue, 14 May 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Metabolomics study finds biomarkers predicting autism in newborns
研究表明睡眠和麻醉会阻碍大脑毒素的清除研究人员发现，在睡眠和麻醉期间，大脑清除率都会降低，这与这些状态增强毒素清除的观点相矛盾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Sleep-and-anesthesia-hinder-brain-toxin-clearance-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Sleep-and-anesthesia-hinder-brain-toxin-clearance-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d1dde17-a81e-498d-ac38-e7f85f0f590d Tue, 14 May 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Sleep and anesthesia hinder brain toxin clearance, study reveals
脂肪和交感神经元之间的相互作用导致心律失常《细胞报告医学》中的一项研究使用脂肪细胞、心肌细胞和交感神经元的体外共培养，揭示脂肪神经轴在心律失常发生中发挥着至关重要的作用，由心外膜脂肪组织和交感神经系统之间的相互作用驱动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Interactions- Between-adipose-and-sympathetic-neurons-contribute-to-cardiac-arrythmia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Interactions- Between-adipose-and-sympathetic-neurons-contribute-to-cardiac-arrythmia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b6bdbce-9578-448d-bc71-748379a92c8d Tue, 14 May 2024 22:57:00 -0400 Interactions between adipose and sympathetic neurons contribute to cardiac arrhythmia
在四年的肥胖研究中，索马鲁肽显示出显着的减肥效果和健康益处《自然医学》的一项研究评估了索马鲁肽对肥胖但无糖尿病的成年人的体重和人体测量结果的影响，发现四年来体重显着减轻，健康指标得到改善。该研究还强调了索马鲁肽在不同 BMI 类别中的安全性和耐受性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Semaglutide-shows-significant-weight-loss-and-health-benefits-in-four-year-obesity-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Semaglutide-shows-significant-weight-loss-and-health-benefits-in-four-year-obesity-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecd5a0e9-75e0-44fa-9ff3-c2676ae6c584 Tue, 14 May 2024 22:16:00 -0400 Semaglutide shows significant weight loss and health benefits in four-year obesity study
划桨有益于心理健康：“水上自由”研究揭示了 SUP 的长期益处《医疗保健》杂志上的一项研究强调了立式划桨 (SUP) 对精神障碍患者的心理健康和福祉的显着长期益处，正如“水上自由”项目所示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Paddling-through-mental-health-Long-term-benefits-of-SUP-revealed-in-Freedom-on-Water-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Paddling-through-mental-health-Long-term-benefits-of-SUP-revealed-in-Freedom-on-Water-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03789bff-791c-49dd-bb06-e8e3705553b3 Tue, 14 May 2024 21:43:00 -0400 Paddling through mental health: Long-term benefits of SUP revealed in "Freedom on Water" study
药物治疗可减少多动症青少年的特定犯罪爱思唯尔出版的《美国儿童和青少年精神病学学会杂志》(JAACAP) 上的一项研究发现，对注意力缺陷/多动障碍 (ADHD) 进行药物治疗可以减少与暴力和公共秩序相关的犯罪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Pharmacological-treatment-reduces-specific-crimes-in-adolescents-with-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Pharmacological-treatment-reduces-specific-crimes-in-adolescents-with-ADHD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac3867cb-4f46-43ff-a6e9-b32b519aa0f3 Tue, 14 May 2024 16:39:00 -0400 Pharmacological treatment reduces specific crimes in adolescents with ADHD
开发新的风险评估工具来预测心力衰竭患者的结果UVA Health 研究人员开发了一种强大的新风险评估工具，用于预测心力衰竭患者的结果。研究人员已将该工具免费提供给临床医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/New-risk-assessment-tool-development-for-predicting-outcomes-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/New-risk-assessment-tool-development-for-predicting-outcomes-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0755353-e1d1-4b4e-99a6-e1c7b78fd463 Tue, 14 May 2024 16:30:00 -0400 New risk assessment tool developed for predicting outcomes in heart failure patients
基于人体细胞的胸主动脉瘤模型为药物开发提供了新机遇一项研究表明，密歇根医学研究人员利用实验室大鼠的人类细胞开发了胸主动脉瘤的功能模型，为更有效地了解疾病发展和潜在致命疾病的治疗创造了机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Human-cell-based-model-of-thoracic-aortic-aneurysm-offers-new-opportunities-for-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Human-cell-based-model-of-thoracic-aortic-aneurysm-offers-new-opportunities-for-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba54a4e1-74fe-464c-be41-98d5584dd355 Tue, 14 May 2024 16:23:00 -0400 Human cell-based model of thoracic aortic aneurysm offers new opportunities for drug development
反思青少年时期对心理健康和复原力的力量萨里大学的一项新研究表明，让年轻人给年轻时的自己提供建议可能会对他们的自尊、适应力和心理健康产生积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/The-power-of-reflecting-on-teenage-years-for-mental-health-and-resilience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/The-power-of-reflecting-on-teenage-years-for-mental-health-and-resilience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77a96269-d9b3-4390-9576-f86e0a999e66 Tue, 14 May 2024 16:17:00 -0400 The power of reflecting on teenage years for mental health and resilience
机器学习揭示大脑结构中隐藏的性别差异一项新的研究表明，处理 MRI 结果的人工智能 (AI) 计算机程序显示男性和女性大脑在细胞水平上的组织方式存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Machine-learning-unveils-hidden-gender-differences-in-brain-struct.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Machine-learning-unveils-hidden-gender-differences-in-brain-struct.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79e40013-2e82-41e0-9d2c-902b592e7036 Tue, 14 May 2024 16:10:00 -0400 Machine learning unveils hidden gender differences in brain structure
